_sText:
Well, the first map iv ever published, havent counted any hours of how long iv been doing this

The maps general idea was to have some simple holes on the walls and to make bunker walls less thick so that the bunkers wouldnt be too used camp spots

--------------------------------------------
Update to 1.1

Added the lighting to the map, if the slow pulse type of light bugs people then i will change it to normal light

--------------------------------------------
Update to 1.2

Chanegd the slow pulsing light to regular lighting and added glasses on the ceiling windows
